medical_history.chief_complaint: Increased work of breathing over the past month following an upper respiratory infection.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one month prior to admission, following an upper respiratory infection, and have progressively worsened. The patient exhibited stridor with minimal improvement after a trial of vaporized epinephrine and albuterol.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Palmo-plantar callouses and painful subungual hypertrophy of the fingers and toes, for which the patient had undergone matricectomy.
medical_history.family_history: The mother and three older siblings have subungual hypertrophy and palmoplantar hyperkeratosis with blisters.
